name: Some Wait Dreaming
description:
Thank you for considering playing the prototype of Some Wait Dreaming. 

Some Wait Dreaming is an atmospheric investigating puzzle game, taking inspiration from escape rooms and games like The Room and Soma.

  • Please read the readMe-file before starting the game. 
  • When you are done, please answer questionnaire.

Thank you again, from all of us here at Twin Wisp Arts
